import axios from 'axios' import React, { useState } from 'react' function Form({setRefresh, heading}) { const [data, setData] = useState() const [colorState, setColorState] = useState(true) function onSubmit (e) { e.preventDefault() axios.post('http://localhost:8000/add-user',data).then((response) => { setRefresh() alert('user added') }) } function colorClick(e) { e.preventDefault() setColorState( colorState=== false?true:false) } function onChange (e) { setData({ ...data, [e.target.name]:e.target.value }) } return (

Create Your Fan Accout

) } export default Form
